requirements.minimum_road_width: Road width must accommodate load width plus safe clearance
requirements.height_pole: Required for loads approaching overhead clearances
requirements.pilot_car_escort: Requirements vary by dimensions; specific requirements in permit
requirements.trip_permits: Available through WisDOT system at WISCONSINDOT.GOV; single trip and multiple trip permits available
requirements.fuel_permits: IFTA credentials required for interstate carriers
requirements.running_hours: Loads ≤12'W x 13'6"H x 100'L may run 24/7 except 4-11pm on Sundays and 4-11pm between 4th Sunday in May and Labor Day; overweight-only: 24/7 including weekends/holidays unless stated otherwise
requirements.holiday_restrictions: Limited restrictions; primarily time-of-day restrictions rather than full holiday bans
requirements.banner_regulations: When vehicle/load >10'W or overlength, 2 warning signs required (front and rear): 'OVERSIZE LOAD' in black letters on yellow background, ≥7'L x 18"H
requirements.flag_regulations: Flags required at extremities for oversize loads
requirements.warning_light_regulations: Amber warning lights required on escort vehicles
requirements.permit_dimensions: Legal: 75'L x 8'6"W x 13'6"H x 80,000 lbs; overhang: 3' front, 4' rear; Superload: >16'W or >150,000 lbs
requirements.annual_permit_cost: $100-$300 depending on configuration and permit type
requirements.commodity_specific: Multiple trip permits specify power unit, load, and dimensions; special provisions for construction equipment
requirements.route_requirements: Route review fees apply when necessitated by size or weight ($10/district); weight review fee $10 when necessary; permits issued per s.348.26 and 348.27 Wis. Stats.

permit_costs.notes: Oversize single trip: $25 + $0.03/ft/mile for >15'W or >15'H or >75'L; Overweight single trip: min $40 + $0.06/ton (or fraction) of legal weight; Forest products/baled hay/combine headers: $15 single trip, $50 extended period (up to 90 days)

requirements.minimum_road_width: Road width must accommodate load width plus safe clearance
requirements.height_pole: Escort vehicle with height-measuring device required for ≥17' high to the front
requirements.pilot_car_escort: Front escort with height device for ≥17'H; 1 rear escort for ≥25' rear overhang; loads >18'W require 24-hour prior notification
requirements.trip_permits: Available through WYDOT system at DOT.STATE.WY.US; permit or permission required before travel
requirements.fuel_permits: IFTA credentials required for interstate carriers
requirements.running_hours: 1/2 hour before sunrise to 1/2 hour after sunset for oversize and overweight shipments
requirements.holiday_restrictions: No escorted holiday travel on New Year's Day, Memorial Day, Independence Day, Labor Day, Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Day
requirements.banner_regulations: "OVERSIZE LOAD" signs with yellow background, 60" wide x 10" high, black letters ≥8" high
requirements.flag_regulations: Flags required at extremities for oversize loads
requirements.warning_light_regulations: Amber warning lights required on escort vehicles
requirements.permit_dimensions: Legal: 85'L (vehicle combinations) x 53' (single) x 8'6"W x 13.5'H x 80,000 lbs; axle limits: single 20k, tandem 36k, triple 42.5k
requirements.annual_permit_cost: $150-$400 depending on configuration; extended period permits available
requirements.commodity_specific: Special permits for forest products, baled hay, and combine headers: $15 single trip or $50 extended period (up to 90 days)
requirements.route_requirements: All loads over legal limits must have permit before traveling on Wyoming highways; 24-hour prior notification required for >18'W; height measuring device required for tall loads
